InteropTopicSubscriptionDtl.name: InteropTopicSubscriptionDtl
InteropTopicSubscriptionDtl.description: Represents the details of an interoperability topic subscription.

DetailRecordId.description: The detail record added to the interoperability topic subscription.

DetailType.description: The type of detail added to the interoperability topic subscription.

InteropTopicSubscriptionId.description: The interoperability topic subscription for which the details are added.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic subscription detail record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic subscription detail record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interoperability topic subscription detail.
